job.title: Cloud Engineer
job.description: ps kindly apply only if you are eligible to work in canada we do not provide sponsorship visa servicesltbrgtltbrgtthe cloud engineer may be responsible for but is not limited toltbrgtltbrgtprogramming experience in one or more programming languages java cc c objective c python javascriptltbrgtdevelopment experience including experience with new devops tools and methods andor agile developmentltbrgtexperience with one or more infrastructure as code tools such as cloud formation deployment manager terraform ansibleltbrgtexperience in software systems design with experience in architecting distributed systemsltbrgtexperience in architecting developing andor maintaining productiongrade systemsltbrgtexperience in virtualization multitenant cloud infrastructures storage systems and content delivery networksltbrgtstrong development experience and delivery history in key scripting languages ruby python powershell groovy or another common programming languageltbrgtproven experience with a cloud provider aws google cloud microsoft azure
